channel.title: Idea for a great server need to get in contact with developers
channel.description: Hello there i am Dcranger (jeff) i have led my clan in runescape from 2004 and currently still open during these 10 years open i have been through all of the changes in runescape and currently on oldschool with that said i have taken my clan to several private servers when it died i have more experience in the clan world then anyone could ever dream of not to mention the contacts and the will to get clans to play on a server. i have an idea for the best server that caters to clans and will be super active money can be made but more important a community of the clan world and lots of fun wars will be had its 8am im on no sleep so sorry if this is short and not much info but if you would like to contact me my skype is dcranger9121 or you can message me here.

item.title: Idea for a great server need to get in contact with developers

item.description:
@420pkers wrote:

Hello there i am Dcranger (jeff) i have led my clan in runescape from 2004 and currently still open during these 10 years open i have been through all of the changes in runescape and currently on oldschool with that said i have taken my clan to several private servers when it died i have more experience in the clan world then anyone could ever dream of not to mention the contacts and the will to get clans to play on a server. i have an idea for the best server that caters to clans and will be super active money can be made but more important a community of the clan world and lots of fun wars will be had its 8am im on no sleep so sorry if this is short and not much info but if you would like to contact me my skype is dcranger9121 or you can message me here.
